data.title: NetSuite - M&A Summary, Ownership, and Business Overview
data.meta_description:
NetSuite has acquired 9 companies of its own. A total of 2 acquisitions came from private equity firms.
                NetSuite’s largest acquisition to date was in 2009, when it acquired QuickArrow for $20M. NetSuite has acquired in 6 different US states, and 2 countries. The Company’s most targeted sectors include internet software and services (63%) and  software (25%).
data.text:
NetSuite M&A Summary

NetSuite has acquired 9 companies of its own. A total of 2 acquisitions came from private equity firms.

NetSuite’s largest acquisition to date was in 2009, when it acquired QuickArrow for $20M. NetSuite has acquired in 6 different US states, and 2 countries. The Company’s most targeted sectors include internet software and services (63%) and software (25%).

NetSuite Ownership

NetSuite Business Overview
